Rで画像解析をしているが、遅い

```{r demo1}

library(EBImage)
library(imager)
library(raster)

img_path <- "~/Dropbox/KeachMurakami.github.io/images/2017-07-28/large_leaf.jpg"

# EBImage
system.time(readImage(img_path) %>% .@.Data %>% .[,,2])

# imager
system.time(load.image(img_path) %>% .[, , 1, 2])


# raster
system.time(brick(img_path) %>% as.matrix)


```
